translation.en: -[woman] Loyal readers, -[keys clacking] my favorite holiday is just around the corner.
translation.zh:
忠实的读者们 我最喜欢的节日
就要来了

translation.en: Christmas means joy, excitement, family, love and lights.
translation.zh:
圣诞节代表快乐、
兴奋、家庭、爱情和光明

translation.en: It also means my first year as Queen of Aldovia
translation.zh:
这也意味着我作为
奥尔德维亚女王的第一年

translation.en: is nearly under my belt.
And just... [inhales] Wow!
What a year.
translation.zh: 多么令人期待的一年啊

translation.en: Royal life has a way of transforming everything.
As the year began,
Richard and I enjoyed a magical honeymoon.
translation.zh: 理查德和我度过了一个超棒的蜜月

translation.en: Once home,
our revised new Aldovia initiative continued to grow.
translation.zh:
我们修订后的新奥尔德维亚
倡议继续发展

translation.en: And that's how we'll fund the tech center.
translation.zh: 这就是我们资助技术中心

translation.en: And the new hospital.
[Amber] And quickly began paying dividends.
translation.zh: 以及迅速开始支付股息的方式

translation.en: As did my efforts to learn about Aldovia's history and families.
translation.zh:
正如我努力了解奥尔德维亚
和家族的历史一样

translation.en: -That knowledge is very helpful -[indistinct chatter] at functions like Royal State dinners.
translation.zh:
这类知识在皇家国宴等
活动中非常有用

translation.en: And the people of Aldovia are fully embracing
translation.zh: 奥尔德维亚的市民都非常欢迎

translation.en: their Queen Amber of New York.
-[keys clacking] -This year has been super busy,
but next year is gonna be...
even busier.
-[applause] -[man] Richard, this way!
[woman, yelling] Congratulations on the baby!
-[cameras shutter] -Over here!
[woman 2] Beautiful!
Have you chosen the baby's name?
translation.zh: 您给宝宝取了名字了吗？

translation.en: [together] No.
-[laughter] -Are you expecting a boy or a girl?
translation.zh: 你希望是男孩还是女孩？

translation.en: -We haven't found out yet. -We're waiting to be surprised.
translation.zh:
-我们还不知道
-希望能给我们带来惊喜

translation.en: You've updated Aldovia's line of succession to include females.
translation.zh:
您更新了奥尔德维亚的继承权
把女性也包括在内

translation.en: Does that mean it's a girl?
It means that we are hoping to bring Aldovia
translation.zh:
这意味着我们希望在文化上
将奥尔德维亚带进

translation.en: into the 21st Century culturally, just as the new Aldovia initiative
translation.zh:
21世纪  正如奥尔德维亚的新倡议在经济上
所做的那样

translation.en: -has done economically. -[clamoring]
translation.zh:
正如奥尔德维亚的新倡议在经济上
所做的那样

translation.en: Will you at least tell us the baby's due date?
translation.zh:
您能至少告诉我们孩子的
预产期吗？

translation.en: January the 11th.
Will you be taking time off?
-[Amber] Yes. -Starting in two days time,
following the centennial treaty signing with the Kingdom of Penglia.
translation.zh: 在与彭利亚王国签署百年条约之后

translation.en: Our last official duty of the year.
translation.zh: 那是我们今年的最后一项公务

translation.en: Now are there any policy questions, economic queries, foreign affairs?
translation.zh:
现在有什么政策问题 经济问题
外交问题吗？

translation.en: No.
About the baby. Do you have any names to share?
translation.zh:
关于宝宝
您有想好名字和我们分享吗？

translation.en: -[together] No. -[laughter]
Have you truly not chosen the name?
translation.zh: 您真的没有去想要取什么名字吗？

translation.en: You won't give up, will you?
translation.zh: 你不会放弃的 是吧？

translation.en: Well, I'd be delighted to finally know what names you're considering.
translation.zh:
嗯 我很高兴 终于知道
你在考虑什么名字

translation.en: We're not telling anyone, Mother.
translation.zh:
我们不会告诉任何人的
妈妈

translation.en: We're all family here.
What Richard said.
-For a girl, I say Khaleesi. -Hermione is lovely as well.
translation.zh:
-如果是女孩 叫卡丽熙
-赫敏也很好听

translation.en: Claudette is a family name I'm very fond of
translation.zh:
克劳地是一个姓
我非常喜欢男孩叫这个名字

translation.en: or Claude for a boy.
Well, if it is a boy, I won't be offended if you decided to name him Simon,
translation.zh:
如果是个男孩 如果你决定给他
取名西蒙  或者给女孩取名为

translation.en: or Simone for a girl, obviously.
translation.zh:
西蒙妮
很明显我不会生气的

translation.en: All lovely names, we will take them under advisement.
translation.zh: 我们会仔细考虑所有可爱的名字

translation.en: Your Majesty, in a few weeks' time when the baby arrives,
translation.zh:
尊敬的女王陛下
再过几个星期当孩子出生时

translation.en: the surprise will be all the sweeter.
You always put things in perspective.
I just hope I'm half as beautiful as Amber is when I become pregnant.
translation.zh: 我只希望我怀孕时有琥珀一半漂亮

translation.en: That's an unsettling thought to put into your mother's head.
translation.zh: 这个想法 会让你母亲不安的

translation.en: Not nearly as unsettling as your continued presence.
translation.zh:
没有你继续在这
那样令人不安

translation.en: Your Majesties,
you have a guest.
I wonder who on Earth that could be.
Surprise!
-Melissa! -[Melissa laughs]
Oh, you look fantastic!
translation.zh: 哦 你看起来棒极了！

translation.en: -I feel like a watermelon. -[scoffs]
But it's so great that you could surprise me early for the baby shower.
translation.zh:
但 你能在产前派对上早点给我惊喜
这太棒了

translation.en: I am early, but that's not actually the surprise.
translation.zh: 我来早了 但这并不令人惊讶

translation.en: Simon's invited me to stay through Christmas. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 西蒙邀请我呆到圣诞节

translation.en: A fabulous idea, if I may say so.
translation.zh:
我可以说
这是个绝妙的主意吗

translation.en: Wow, great! [laughs]
It's so good to see you.
Yeah. [laughs] You too. So, are you daddy ready?
translation.zh: 是的 我也是 你准备好当爸爸了吗？

translation.en: -Getting there, [exhales] I think. -[Melissa giggles]
Staying with someone's family over Christmas is a big deal.
translation.zh: 圣诞节和家人呆在一起是件大事

translation.en: -She should've told us. -She wanted to surprise you.
translation.zh:
-她应该告诉我们的
-她想给你一个惊喜

translation.en: She knows how you feel about Simon.
translation.zh: 她知道你对西蒙的感觉

translation.en: -[sighs] Well, I don't trust him. -No, neither do I.
translation.zh:
-嗯 我不信任他
-是的 我也不信任他

translation.en: He has behaved all year.
In the hope that we'll give him an official position.
translation.zh: 希望我们能给他一个正式职位

translation.en: Which we haven't.
[stammers] I just don't want Melissa to get hurt.
translation.zh: 我只是不想梅丽莎受伤

translation.en: Let them be.
We have more important issues to attend to.
translation.zh: 我们有更重要的事情要处理

translation.en: Like my birth plan.
And the baby's musical enrichment.
I'm pretty sure research debunked the myth
translation.zh: 我很确定研究揭穿了这个

translation.en: that classical music makes your baby smarter.
translation.zh: 古典音乐让你的宝宝更聪明的神话

translation.en: Classical music makes everybody smarter,
translation.zh: 古典音乐让每个人都更聪明

translation.en: which I need to be to build this crib.
translation.zh: 我需要它来建造这个婴儿床

translation.en: Instruction manual's more complicated than differential calculus.
translation.zh: 说明书比微积分更复杂

translation.en: -[man] Taxi! -[indistinct chatter]
Hey, Pop.
Hey Peanut. I'm almost packed.
translation.zh: 嘿 小花生 我快打包好了

translation.en: What's cracking in Aldovania?
translation.zh: 奥尔德瓦尼亚最近怎样？

translation.en: You still can't say it right.
Pack warmly, it's cold here.
translation.zh: 带点厚衣服 这里很冷

translation.en: Now why couldn't you marry the king of some tropical paradise?
translation.zh:
为什么你不能嫁给某个热带
天堂的国王？

translation.en: -She sunburns too easily. -[Amber chuckles]
Did you figure out how long you can stay yet?
Gus is gonna cover the diner,
translation.zh: 格斯会负责餐馆的事情

translation.en: so I can stay from the baby shower all the way until little Rudy's birth.
translation.zh:
这样我就可以从产前派对
呆到小鲁迪出生

translation.en: -Pardon me? -Oops! Sorry.
Prince Rudy's birth.
-Pop! -Hey, I'm just saying.
Amber, what are you doing out here? It's so cold.
translation.zh:
安布尔 你在外面干什么？
天气真冷

translation.en: -Just getting some air. -You should've woken me up.
You need your sleep.
You know, when the baby comes.
translation.zh: 你知道的 到孩子出生时

translation.en: What do you have there?
Nothing.
Don't judge my cravings. [chuckles]
Never.
What do they call it? Sympathetic weight gain syndrome?
translation.zh:
他们叫它什么？
交感神经体重增加综合征？

translation.en: Don't tattle to Dr. Magoro. I'm supposed to watch my sugars.
translation.zh:
别跟马戈洛医生打小报告
我本来应该注意不能吃糖的

translation.en: You have my word.
[Dr. Magoro] Fetal heart rate excellent.
Amniotic fluid levels superb.
-Your baby is beautiful. -[Richard chuckles]
Going forward, anything special we should do?
translation.zh:
接下来
我们要做什么特别的事情吗？

translation.en: Avoid special as much as possible.
translation.zh: 尽可能避免做特别的事

translation.en: Queen Amber needs her rest and relaxation,
translation.zh: 安布尔女王需要休息和放松

translation.en: nothing more.
-That sounds ideal. -[door opens]
Hello, can we get a peek?
translation.zh: 你好 我们能看一眼吗？

translation.en: I'd love to see my little grandchild.
Can you print a copy for auntie Mel?
translation.zh: 你能给梅尔阿姨打印一份吗？

translation.en: If you want to know if it's a boy or a girl, you'll be disappointed.
translation.zh:
如果你想知道是男孩还是女孩
你会失望的

translation.en: -Foiled again. -[Richard chuckles]
Try harder next time.
Just what the doctor ordered.
Nothing is more important right now -than time to ourselves. -[thud]
translation.zh:
对我们自己来说 现在没有什么
比时间更重要了

translation.en: To quote your sister, I'm not a china doll.
translation.zh:
引用你姐姐的话
我不是瓷器娃娃

translation.en: No, you're far more valuable.
I want you both to have the best of everything, including sleigh rides.
translation.zh:
我希望你们都拥有最好的一切
包括雪橇之旅

translation.en: I've been thinking,
and I want this baby to have a normal life,
translation.zh: 我希望这个宝宝过上正常的生活

translation.en: as normal as possible.
Our child will be heir to the Kingdom.
translation.zh: 我们的孩子将成为王国的继承人

translation.en: Still, I went to public school, I played with neighborhood kids.
translation.zh:
尽管如此 我还是去了公立学校
我和邻居的孩子一起玩

translation.en: I went to boarding school and played polo.
I was riding a subway by myself when I was ten, and I ate diner food.
translation.zh:
十岁的时候 我一个人坐地铁
吃晚餐

translation.en: I had nannies to make sure I ate my vegetables.
translation.zh: 我有保姆 来确保我吃了蔬菜

translation.en: -I turned out all right. -So did I.
translation.zh:
-我最后也成长得很好
-我也是

translation.en: We'll find a new definition of normal together.
translation.zh: 我们会一起找到正常的新定义

translation.en: -No boarding school. -No boarding school.
translation.zh:
-不上寄宿学校
-不上寄宿学校

translation.en: [inhales] But no subway riding, either.
Well, luckily for you, Aldovia doesn't have a subway.
translation.zh:
好吧 你很幸运
奥尔德维亚没有地铁

translation.en: Your Majesties,
with an eye to the Penglians' official visit and treaty signing
translation.zh: 着眼于彭联一行的正式访问和

translation.en: proceeding as smoothly as possible,
translation.zh: 条约签署进程尽可能顺利

translation.en: we feel a review is prudent.
translation.zh: 我们认为审查是谨慎的

translation.en: Thank you for making the time.
Well, this is the last of the time you will get of our Queen,
translation.zh: 这是您最后一次见到我们的女王了

translation.en: for the rest of the year will be dedicated exclusively
translation.zh: 今年剩下的时间将专门用于

translation.en: to the preparations for the birth of the royal baby.
translation.zh: 为皇家宝宝的出生做准备

translation.en: Of course.
Mr. Little.
The centennial treaty
renews an ancient truce between Aldovia and Penglia
translation.zh:
这项百年条约延续了奥尔德维亚
和彭利亚之间的

translation.en: that dates back to a war 600 years ago.
translation.zh:
古老休战 这可以追溯到
600年前的一场战争

translation.en: That was the war over Silk Road trading routes, right?
translation.zh:
那是关于丝绸之路贸易路线的战争
对吗？

translation.en: You've studied your history, Queen Amber.
translation.zh:
安布尔女王
您已经研究过您的历史了

translation.en: [Mr. Little] It was a fearsome and brutal war with no end in sight.
translation.zh:
这是一场可怕而残酷的战争
看不到尽头

translation.en: -[mellow flute instrumentals] -Finally, on Christmas Eve 1419,
Prince Claude of Aldovia and Prince Jun of Penglia,
translation.zh:
奥尔德维亚的克劳德王子和
彭利亚的君王子

translation.en: inspired by the season of peace and goodwill,
translation.zh: 受到和平和友好季节的鼓舞

translation.en: found a way to end the conflict.
translation.zh: 找到了结束冲突的方法

translation.en: Just before midnight,
translation.zh: 就在午夜之前  在那个决定性的圣诞夜

translation.en: on that fateful Christmas Eve 1419,
translation.zh: 在那个决定性的圣诞夜 宣布停战并签署了条约

translation.en: the truce was declared and the treaty signed.
translation.zh: 宣布停战并签署了条约

translation.en: The treaty, your Majesties.
To honor the peace and friendship between our nations,
translation.zh: 为了纪念我们两国之间的和平与友谊

translation.en: the treaty has been ceremonially renewed
every 100 years since, without fail.
translation.zh:
从那以后每100年都续约
从未停止

translation.en: -[mellow flute instrumentals continue] -The artistry is incredible.
[Richard] It's a treasured artifact.
translation.zh: 这是一件珍贵的艺术品

translation.en: It's been under our protection since 1919.
translation.zh:
从1919年之后
它一直在我们的保护之下

translation.en: And after the signing, it goes back to Penglia
translation.zh: 签约后 它又回到彭利亚

translation.en: for the next hundred years.
It's beautiful, with the signatures of every king.
translation.zh:
这很美好
每个国王都在上面签名

translation.en: [inhales] I'll be the first queen to sign it. You will, indeed.
translation.zh:
-我会是第一个签字的女王
-你会的 确实

translation.en: As long as the royals from Penglia agree.
translation.zh: 只要彭利亚的皇室同意

translation.en: [stammers] Whilst Aldovia boldly plunges into the 21st Century,
translation.zh: 当奥尔德维亚勇敢地跨入21世纪时

translation.en: this treaty dates back to the 15th Century.
translation.zh: 这项条约可以追溯到15世纪

translation.en: We'll have to proceed very carefully, Amber.
translation.zh:
我们必须非常小心地进行下去
 安布尔

translation.en: The Penglians are our closest allies but,
translation.zh: 彭连人是我们最亲密的盟友

translation.en: in many respects, they are quite traditional.
translation.zh: 在许多方面 它们都很传统

translation.en: -[Amber chuckles] -An attitude personified by the Queen of Penglia, Queen Ming.
translation.zh:
彭丽亚女王 明女王所体现的
一种态度

translation.en: Compared to Queen Ming,
even Mrs. Averill comes off as rather carefree.
translation.zh:
甚至艾弗里尔夫人
也表现得相当无忧无虑

translation.en: [Mrs. Averill] I have my carefree moments.
translation.zh: 我有我无忧无虑的时刻

translation.en: I had one last Sunday. [chuckles]
I love a challenge. I can't wait to meet Queen Ming.
translation.zh:
我喜欢挑战
我等不及要见明女王了

translation.en: They shall be here momentarily.
[Mrs. Averill] Now come on, everybody. Move into place, quickly.
translation.zh: 来吧 大家 快点就位

translation.en: Once they exit, meet them in the center. King Richard will give a formal greeting.
translation.zh:
一旦他们出来 在中心与他们会合
理查德国王将正式问候

translation.en: Welcome to Aldovia.
A most hearty welcome.
We're here to celebrate a hand clasp on a battlefield 600 years ago.
translation.zh:
我们是来庆祝600年前战场上的
握手言和的

translation.en: That changed the fate of both our nations.
translation.zh: 这改变了我们两国的命运

translation.en: -[cameras shutter] -[chuckles] King Richard, so glad to finally meet you in person.
translation.zh:
理查德国王
很高兴终于见到您本人

translation.en: Good to see you too, King Tai.
translation.zh:
我也很高兴见到您
泰王

translation.en: May I introduce my wife, Queen Amber.
translation.zh:
请允许我介绍我的妻子
安布尔女王

translation.en: An honor. You're as lovely and charming as they say.
translation.zh:
荣幸之至
您和他们说的一样 可爱迷人

translation.en: My wife, Queen Ming of Penglia.
translation.zh: 我的妻子 彭利亚的明女王

translation.en: -Queen Ming. -I'm most pleased to be here.
And to finally lay eyes on the famous Queen Amber of New York.
translation.zh:
最后 终于看到了著名的纽约
安布尔女王

translation.en: Wonderful to meet you, Queen Ming.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到您 明女王

translation.en: And you.
I'm Amber, hi.
translation.zh: 我是 安布尔 嗨

translation.en: Lynn is our attaché.
Lynn?
Fantastic!
Beautiful.
No one does Christmas like the Aldovians.
translation.zh: 没有人像奥尔德维亚人一样过圣诞节

translation.en: Thank you. We do our best.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 我们尽力了

translation.en: If Emily had her way, we'd have a tree in every room.
translation.zh:
如果按艾米丽想法
我们每个房间都会有一棵树

translation.en: Actually, I believe you do.
translation.zh: 事实上 我相信你可以

translation.en: Indeed, Tom.
-We have quite a bit of mistletoe too. -[Tom gulps]
translation.zh: 我们也有相当多的槲寄生

translation.en: [Simon, laughing] That's spectacular.
So, how do you two know each other?
translation.zh: 那么 你们俩是怎么认识的？

translation.en: We studied together, Oxford.
translation.zh: 我们一起学习过 牛津大学

translation.en: I studied. Simon... caroused.
translation.zh: 我在那学习过 西蒙...狂欢

translation.en: I may have enjoyed the occasional night out,
translation.zh: 我可能喜欢偶尔出去玩一晚上

translation.en: but I'm not the one whose picture... -Hey, hey, hey! -...is hanging in the King's Arms Pub.
translation.zh: 但照片挂在国王的武器酒吧的不是我

translation.en: [man] Red for you, your Highness.
And sparkling water for you, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 为您准备的苏打水 陛下

translation.en: Thank you, Mr Zabala.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 萨巴拉先生

translation.en: It appears you've adapted comfortably to your new role.
translation.zh: 看来你已经舒适地适应了你的新角色

translation.en: I like to think so.
Not to say there haven't been growing pains.
translation.zh: 不是说没有成长的烦恼

translation.en: What with the Belgravians here, in Aldovia, as well,
translation.zh:
奥尔德维亚的烦恼
贝尔格莱维亚人也有

translation.en: it seems royals marrying outside of noble classes
translation.zh:
似乎王室成员和贵族阶层
之外的人结婚

translation.en: has become quite fashionable.
And now your first child -on the way. Congratulations. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.zh:
现在您的第一个孩子就要出生了
恭喜您

translation.en: Providing your kingdom with an heir
translation.zh: 为您的王国提供继承人

translation.en: is historically a Queen's utmost duty.
translation.zh: 历史上是女王的最高职责

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, I don't see it as a duty at all.
translation.zh: 哦 我一点也不认为这是一种责任

translation.en: Richard and I are simply excited to start our family.
translation.zh: 理查德和我很高兴能组建我们的家庭

translation.en: You have three children of your own?
Yes. Harry is 13. Vivian and Amanda are ten.
translation.zh:
是的 哈利13岁
薇薇安和阿曼达十岁

translation.en: Twins? I can't even imagine. [laughs]
translation.zh:
双胞胎？
我都无法想象

translation.en: I have to admit, I was excited to finally meet the playboy prince.
translation.zh:
我得承认
我很兴奋终于见到了花花公子王子

translation.en: -[Richard chuckles] -I enjoyed living vicariously through your exploits in the press.
translation.zh:
我喜欢通过你在媒体上发布的消息
来感受你的生活

translation.en: It's all greatly exaggerated.
I was actually hoping to talk some business with you.
translation.zh: 我其实想和你谈点生意

translation.en: Business? Quite honestly,
I prefer to leave that tedium to Lynn.
translation.zh: 我更喜欢把这种沉闷留给林恩

translation.en: Congratulations on your new position, very impressive.
translation.zh:
祝贺您的新职位
真令人印象深刻

translation.en: It's a start, but I soon hope to be accomplishing more.
translation.zh:
这是一个开始
但我很快希望能完成更多

translation.en: Ambitious as ever. [playfully scoffs]
What's your role at the palace?
translation.zh: 你在宫殿里是什么角色？

translation.en: Cousin to the King, but you know me, working the angles.
translation.zh:
国王的堂兄 但你知道我的
处理各种事情

translation.en: -Oh, you always do. [laughs] -[Simon laughs]
[scoffs] Pardon me, got to take this. Angles of my own.
translation.zh:
对不起 我得接这个电话
我自己的私事

translation.en: [inhales] She's a live wire.
translation.zh: 她是行走的带电的电线

translation.en: Enjoying yourself?
-[stammers] Of course, yeah. -[Richard exhales in relief]
Are you familiar with Aldovia's modernization efforts?
translation.zh: 您熟悉奥尔德维亚的现代化努力吗？

translation.en: I'm familiar with all aspects of Aldovia's policy.
translation.zh: 我熟悉奥尔德维亚政策的所有方面

translation.en: Given its success, I spoke with Richard and
translation.zh:
鉴于它的成功
我和理查德谈过了

translation.en: we feel that you and I should add our signatures to the treaty.
translation.zh:
我们觉得您和我
应该在条约上签名

translation.en: You wish to modernize our 600 year old tradition?
translation.zh: 您想让我们600年的传统现代化吗？

translation.en: We, the Queens, could bring the tradition up to date.
translation.zh: 我们女王们 可以更新传统

translation.en: History isn't made by those who follow rules.
translation.zh: 历史不是由那些遵守规则的人创造的

translation.en: [Mr. Little] Your Majesties.
May I announce the arrival of the CEO
translation.zh: 我可以宣布首席执行官

translation.en: and the Chief Designer from S & A Events International.
translation.zh:
和S & A事件国际的首席设计师
的到来吗

translation.en: -Your Majesties. -It's a pleasure to be here.
Andy, hi!
Sahil!
[Andy] Wow, look at you.
You've never looked more beautiful.
translation.zh: 你比以往任何时候都漂亮

translation.en: So this is what you've been doing? Your secret project?
translation.zh:
这就是你一直在做的吗？
你的秘密项目？

translation.en: Consider Andrew and myself early Christmas gifts.
translation.zh: 想想安德鲁和我自己早期的圣诞礼物

translation.en: Weddings were too small a niche for such a big talent.
translation.zh:
婚礼对这么大的天才来说
太大材小用了

translation.en: We rebranded and expanded Sahil's business.
translation.zh: 我们重塑并扩大了萨赫勒的业务

translation.en: I was happy to give Andrew the opportunity.
translation.zh: 我很高兴给安德鲁这个机会

translation.en: Design genius meets management expertise.
translation.zh: 设计天才符合管理专业知识

translation.en: Mrs. Averill engaged us to make sure that you had
translation.zh: 阿维利尔太太让我们确保您有

translation.en: the most spectacular royal baby shower of all time.
translation.zh: 史上最壮观的皇家宝宝产前派对

translation.en: -You deserve it. -Thanks.
May I also offer our service, free of charge,
translation.zh: 我也可以免费为明天的条约签署

translation.en: to the elevation of tomorrow's treaty signing?
Elevation?
I have seen the artifact. It's a bit tacky, no? [laughs]
translation.zh:
我看过那件艺术品
有点俗气 不是吗？

translation.en: It's a priceless work of art.
translation.zh: 这是一件无价的艺术品

translation.en: We will be standing by if you need us.
translation.zh: 如果您需要我们 我们会随时待命

translation.en: Great.
[Amber] Next question.
During labor I would like to spend the first stage
translation.zh: 分娩期间 我想这样度过第一阶段

translation.en: lying down, standing up, walking around, in the shower or in the tub?
translation.zh:
躺着 站着 走来走去
在淋浴或浴缸里？

translation.en: Lying down.
Walking around. New York, born and raised.
translation.zh: 四处走走 纽约 出生和抚养

translation.en: Never realized labour came in multiple choice.
translation.zh: 从未意识到分娩有多种选择

translation.en: Testing. Testing. Can you hear me?
translation.zh: 测试 你能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: I can hear you.
Let's test it for real.
Extraordinary.
-Are you seeing this? -Yeah.
-[Amber sighs in frustration] -Can you still see me?
-[Amber chuckles] -Amber, hello?
This is unbelievable.
You're right. This is amazing.
translation.zh: 你说得对 这太神奇了

translation.en: Should we try from the nursery?
translation.zh: 我们要在婴儿室试试吗？

translation.en: Now transmitting from the nursery.
-Can you hear me? -[Amber playful groans over monitor]
-Amber, hello? Are you there? -[whimpering over monitor]
translation.zh: 安布尔 哈喽 你在吗？

translation.en: I need a little help.
-Is that crying? Amber? -[whimpering continues]
translation.zh:
那是在哭吗？
安布尔

translation.en: -[exhales] -What is it?
I can't even reach my own slippers.
translation.zh: 我连自己的拖鞋都够不着

translation.en: Allow me.
Perfect fit.
Cinderella was a bit more graceful.
But nowhere near as beautiful.
[Queen Ming] This storm could spell disaster.
translation.zh: 这场风暴可能意味着灾难

translation.en: Where's Lynn? I asked for an update four minutes ago.
translation.zh:
林恩在哪里？
四分钟前我问你最新消息

translation.en: Apologies, Queen Ming. I was speaking to the pilot.
translation.zh:
抱歉 明女王
我在和飞行员说话

translation.en: And?
The storm brought the country to a standstill.
translation.zh: 暴风雪使这个国家陷入停顿

translation.en: All flights have been canceled.
How would this affect the treaty signing?
translation.zh: 这会怎么影响条约的签署？

translation.en: The Aldovians wish to proceed the ceremony as scheduled.
translation.zh: 奥尔德维亚人希望如期举行仪式

translation.en: I agree.
Very well.
Find us a way home directly afterwards.
translation.zh: 之后直接给我们找个方式回家

translation.en: Our children expect us back.
translation.zh: 我们的孩子在等我们回去

translation.en: Yes.
[Queen Helena] Such a shame there are so few guests to witness this beautiful event.
translation.zh:
真遗憾 没有几个客人能见证
这个美丽的事件

translation.en: Yes, I'm afraid no one's been able to travel anywhere today, Your Majesty.
translation.zh:
是的 恐怕今天没有人能去
任何地方旅行 陛下

translation.en: Your Majesties.
As expected, the Penglians have officially rejected
translation.zh:
不出所料 彭利人已经正式拒绝
任何一位

translation.en: -either queen signing the treaty. -[Richard inhales deeply]
[exhales slowly] I'm sorry.
In a few minutes, this will all be over
translation.zh: 几分钟后 一切都会结束

translation.en: and then we can focus on what's most important.
translation.zh: 然后我们可以专注于最重要的事情

translation.en: You and the baby.
There's a little too much red.
I think they can do with a little bit more blue, -to be honest. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 老实说 我想他们可以多用点蓝色的

translation.en: [Sahil] I'm thinking royal blue.
Mm... Yeah. Could work.
In honor of the sacred treaty,
signed on the battlefield on Christmas Eve in the year 1419,
the monarchy of Aldovia
welcomes King Tai and Queen Ming of Penglia.
translation.zh: 欢迎彭利的泰王和明女王

translation.en: No. No, no, no.
It is my great honor and privilege
to preside over the seventh signing of the sacred truce between our realms.
translation.zh:
来主持我们王国之间神圣休战的
第七次签署

translation.en: The entire Kingdom of Aldovia
heartily embraces our alliance with Penglia.
translation.zh: 衷心拥护我们与彭利亚的联盟

translation.en: What began as a handshake on Christmas Eve
translation.zh: 从圣诞前夜的握手开始

translation.en: has evolved into an ever-growing bond
translation.zh: 我们之间的关系纽带越来越紧密

translation.en: represented by our invaluable, ever-expanding
translation.zh: 由我们珍贵的不断发展的条约

translation.en: precious treaty.
Mr. Little, let the signing begin.
translation.zh: 利特尔先生 开始签字吧

translation.en: How is this possible?
Where's the treaty? It's supposed to be there.
translation.zh:
条约在哪里？
它本应该在那里

translation.en: We do apologize.
I'm sure we can get this little mix-up straightened out right away.
translation.zh:
我相信我们可以马上解决
这个小误会

translation.en: Well this is certainly embarrassing.
If we don't sort this out, we'll all end up in the dungeon.
translation.zh:
如果我们不解决这个问题
我们都会被关进地牢

translation.en: Indeed.
Perhaps now it can be replaced with something more palatable.
translation.zh:
也许现在它可以被更宜人的
东西取代

translation.en: There must be an explanation.
Does anyone have any idea what's going on?
translation.zh: 有人知道发生了什么吗？

translation.en: The treaty was there last night when we checked.
translation.zh:
昨晚我们检查的时候
条约还在那里

translation.en: -I can confirm. -And now it's vanished.
I've been saying that we should update the security protocols ever since...
translation.zh: 我一直说我们应该更新安全协议...

translation.en: well, you infiltrated the palace.
But no one has come or gone since the blizzard.
translation.zh:
但是自暴风雪以来
没有人来过 也没有人出去过

translation.en: So the treaty must still be in the palace.
translation.zh: 所以条约连同拿走它的人

translation.en: Along with whoever took it.
-[hushed] What do we do now? -[hushed] I don't know--
translation.zh:
-我们现在该怎么办？
-我不知道

translation.en: [Richard] Simon.
[sighs] We need your help.
You're kidding.
Well, I'd be delighted. What can I do for my king and queen?
translation.zh:
嗯 我很乐意
我能为我的国王和女王做些什么？

translation.en: Find a way to occupy our guests while we locate the treaty.
translation.zh:
在我们找到条约时
想办法招待好我们的客人

translation.en: [hushed] It's okay, we'll make sure-- I'll make sure everything's sorted.
translation.zh:
好的 我们会确保...
我会确保一切都安排好

translation.en: And how am I to do that?
You're friends with Lynn. Keep them entertained.
translation.zh:
你是林恩的朋友
让她们开心

translation.en: Lynn's easy to entertain.
Not so sure about the others.
[hushed] One thing is for certain.
Just stick with Simon and make sure he doesn't do anything Simon-like.
translation.zh:
只要和西蒙在一起
确保他不做任何西蒙式的事情

translation.en: I'll be your eyes and ears.
translation.zh: 我将是你的眼睛和耳朵

translation.en: I know what might be a bit of fun.
translation.zh: 我知道什么可能有点有趣

translation.en: Is this some kind of game?
Top of the tree, a classic Aldovian Christmas game.
translation.zh:
“树顶”是一款经典的
奥尔多维亚圣诞游戏

translation.en: Wow, I haven't played this since I was a kid. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哇 我从小就没玩过这个

translation.en: Shockingly good idea, Simon.
translation.zh: 真是个好主意 西蒙

translation.en: Two teams compete,
the goal being to decorate your side of the tree first.
translation.zh: 目标是先装饰你这边的树

translation.en: The team that places the star on top of the tree wins.
translation.zh: 把星星放在树上的队获胜

translation.en: You want us to play a children's game in the midst of this scandal?
translation.zh: 你想让我们在丑闻中玩儿童游戏？

translation.en: Well, it's an unfortunate delay, it's not really a scandal, yet.
translation.zh:
嗯 这是一个不幸的延误
还不是一个丑闻

translation.en: Simon has a great talent for games.
translation.zh: 西蒙在游戏方面很有天赋

translation.en: -He's definitely talented at many things. -[Simon laughs uneasily]
translation.zh: 他在很多方面都很有天赋

translation.en: Ornaments are awarded for answering questions
about famous royal traditions and legends.
translation.zh: 关于著名的皇家传统和传说问题的人

translation.en: Count me in.
Our children would enjoy this.
I'll go and inform them about the delay.
Of course.
It's a pity though, we should have even teams.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 原本我们应该有团队的

translation.en: Well, I'm happy to sit out if it helps.
translation.zh: 如果需要 我很乐意做一名观望者

translation.en: I'm not exactly a whiz at royal traditions yet.
translation.zh: 我还不是皇家传统的专家

translation.en: I'll join King Tai. I embrace any opportunity to beat Simon.
translation.zh:
我会加入泰王
我抓住一切机会打败西蒙

translation.en: -I like your spirit, Princess. -[chair creaks]
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的精神 公主

translation.en: Well, guess that makes it... [exhales]
you and me. [chuckles]
-Would you like to start? -Yes, please.
Any luck?
Not yet. [sighs]
We know the treaty was here last night.
translation.zh: 我们知道条约昨晚还在这里

translation.en: We know that nobody's entered or left the palace.
translation.zh: 我们知道没有人进出宫殿

translation.en: Are you proposing we make a list of suspects?
translation.zh:
你是在提议我们列份
嫌疑人名单吗

translation.en: Investigative journalism 101.
The treaty didn't fly away on its own.
Did you notice the look that Simon and Lynn exchanged
translation.zh: 你注意到西蒙和林恩交换的眼神了吗

translation.en: when the treaty went missing?
And Sahil called it tacky. I wouldn't put it past him.
translation.zh:
萨赫勒称之为俗气
我不会忘记他的

translation.en: Who in this palace had the means, the opportunity, the motive?
translation.zh: 这座宫殿里谁有手段、机会和动机？

translation.en: -Did you take it? -No.
Neither did I. That's two down.
translation.zh: 我也没有 少了两个嫌疑人

translation.en: Very funny.
Lynn.
[scoffs] This is an easy one.
In the legend "Princess Froon,"
Grendel's pet is what animal?
translation.zh: 格伦戴尔的宠物是什么动物？

translation.en: [scoffs] Even I know this one, from your Christmas pageant.
translation.zh: 连我都从你的圣诞庆典上知道这个

translation.en: -Don't you dare say. -Turtle!
-Yes, well played. One more and we win. -[Lynn squeals in delight]
translation.zh: 是的 玩得好 再来一个 我们就赢了

translation.en: Tweet, tweet, tweet.
-That is beautiful. -[Lynn laughs]
Do you see that, Melissa, what she made? It's amazing.
translation.zh:
你看到了吗 梅丽莎 她做了什么？
太神奇了

translation.en: I can make you one.
Actually, I need to get some air.
translation.zh: 事实上 我需要透透气

translation.en: Melissa! Melissa...
Wait!
We should probably check on Ming.
A pity, Princess Emily, we would have won.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 艾米丽公主 我们会赢的

translation.en: Sorry.
This game was a favorite in my family, too.
translation.zh: 这个游戏也是我家的最爱

translation.en: Final question.
Who was Aldovia's greatest king and father?
translation.zh:
奥尔德维亚最伟大的国王
和父亲是谁？

translation.en: That isn't a real question.
translation.zh: 这不是一个真正的问题

translation.en: But you know the answer.
My father.
The star.
You win.
Will you do the honors?
As you wish.
-[indistinct conversation] -Hey!
Where are you going?
Simon and I need some alone time.
translation.zh: 西蒙和我需要一些独处的时间

translation.en: Melissa suggested a walk in the snow.
translation.zh: 梅丽莎建议在雪地里散步

translation.en: What about the Penglians?
Well Emily's more than capable and my priority is Melissa.
translation.zh:
艾米丽很有能力
我的首要任务是梅丽莎

translation.en: Mel, can we talk a sec?
translation.zh: 梅尔 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
I'll see about clearing a path.
-[kissing sound] -My hero!
What's up?
Well, you and Simon, for one thing.
I never realized you were so close.
translation.zh: 我从未意识到你们如此亲密

translation.en: We talk for hours every night.
translation.zh: 我们每天晚上聊几个小时

translation.en: He's really smart,
funny, super cute and really misunderstood.
translation.zh: 有趣 超级可爱 真的被误解了

translation.en: Misunderstood?
Mel, all your bad boys have left you heartbroken.
translation.zh: 梅尔 你所有的坏男友都让你心碎

translation.en: He's more than just a bad boy.
He cares about me.
It's starting to feel real, you know?
translation.zh: 开始感觉来真的了 你知道吗？

translation.en: We are just worried about his intentions.
translation.zh: 我们只是担心他的意图

translation.en: Have you seen the way he looks at Lynn?
translation.zh: 你见过他看林恩的方式吗？

translation.en: He swears Lynn is just a friend.
translation.zh: 他发誓林恩只是一个朋友

translation.en: I don't know, sometimes I get a little insecure,
translation.zh:
我不知道
有时候我感觉有点没安全感

translation.en: out of my depth with royals, you get that.
translation.zh:
我对皇室不感兴趣
你懂的

translation.en: Yeah, but you don't know Simon like we do.
translation.zh: 是的 但是你不像我们一样了解西蒙

translation.en: And you don't know Simon like I do.
translation.zh: 你不像我一样了解西蒙

translation.en: I appreciate you looking out for me,
-but Simon and I... -[dramatic instrumentals]
we're in love.
Wow!
Not just like a lot or heavily infatuated?
translation.zh:
不仅仅只是像大多数人一样
或者说极度迷恋？

translation.en: I want it to work.
[clicks tongue] I hear you.
Has the treaty been found?
It pains me to say no, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 我很难过说没有 陛下

translation.en: After our initial survey,
translation.zh: 在我们最初的调查之后

translation.en: we can assume it's nowhere obvious.
translation.zh:
我们可以说这不是
很容易能找到的

translation.en: Your Majesty, please, be assured
no one will rest until it's located.
translation.zh: 我们在找到它之前绝不休息

translation.en: Thank you.
Because, according to the treaty's terms,
translation.zh: 因为 根据条约的条款

translation.en: if it's not renewed by midnight on Christmas Eve,
translation.zh: 如果圣诞夜午夜前还没有更新

translation.en: Aldovia and Penglia technically return to a state of war.
translation.zh:
奥尔德维亚和彭利亚确切地说
回到了战争状态

translation.en: Should be interesting, as neither country has a standing army.
translation.zh: 应该很有趣 因为两国都没有常备军

translation.en: Emily, I thought you were with our guests.
translation.zh:
艾米丽 我以为你和我们的
客人在一起

translation.en: Simon had to end the game abruptly. They've returned to their rooms.
translation.zh:
西蒙突然结束比赛
他们已经回到自己的房间

translation.en: This situation is just so inelegant.
translation.zh: 这种情况实在是太不体面了

translation.en: Please, continue to search.
Your Majesty.
Is this about the treaty?
Mother, did you read this?
translation.zh: 妈妈 你读过这个吗？

translation.en: "If there comes a day the sacred truce is broken,
translation.zh: “如果有一天神圣的休战被打破

translation.en: the Kingdom disrupting the peace shall suffer a dreadful fate:
translation.zh:
扰乱和平的王国将
在第一个孩子出生后

translation.en: upon the firstborn a beshrew."
What's a beshrew?
[scoffs] It's a curse.
People believed in things like that back then.
translation.zh: 那时人们相信这样的事情

translation.en: How did it work?
A sorceress would conjure a spell
to ensure that the two kingdoms upheld the treaty.
So, if we don't sign the treaty by Christmas Eve,
translation.zh:
所以 如果我们不在圣诞夜前
签署条约

translation.en: there'll be a curse on the firstborn child?
That's Amber and Richard's baby.
translation.zh: 那是 安布尔和理查德的孩子

translation.en: Sorcery fell out of favor centuries ago.
translation.zh: 巫术几个世纪前就失宠了

translation.en: Emily, we're not going to bother anyone with this nonsense.
translation.zh:
艾米莉我们不会用这些废话
来打扰任何人

translation.en: But what if it isn't nonsense?
translation.zh: 但是如果这不是胡说呢？

translation.en: [Richard] What is it?
Baby's kicking a lot.
Amazing.
Little striker in there.
More likely upset about my chat with Melissa.
translation.zh:
更可能是因为我和梅丽莎的
聊天而心烦意乱

translation.en: Does Simon have an alibi?
No idea, but she thinks he's a great guy, says they're in love.
translation.zh:
不知道 但她认为他是个好人
说他们相爱了

translation.en: Love is blind.
Perhaps sleuthing while pregnant isn't the best idea.
translation.zh: 也许怀孕时侦查不是最好的主意

translation.en: I may be expecting and Queen,
but I'm still a journalist.
And right now, my investigation needs your help.
translation.zh: 现在我的调查需要你的帮助

translation.en: Not now, Andrew. I'm in the zone, designing.
translation.zh:
现在不行 安德鲁
我现在正遨游在设计的世界里

translation.en: -Andrew! -[paper whooshes]
Andrew--
Your Majesty.
Please, come-- come in.
translation.zh: 拜托 进来 进来

translation.en: Sorry to disturb you, Sahil.
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰你 萨赫勒

translation.en: I have a design question about the nursery.
translation.zh: 我有一个关于婴儿室的设计问题

translation.en: Do you have a moment?
Now? [stammers] Of course, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 现在吗 当然 陛下

translation.en: I appreciate this.
It's about the best location for the crib, given the layout.
translation.zh: 考虑到布局 这是婴儿床的最佳位置

translation.en: Spatial flow is absolutely crucial.
translation.zh: 空间流动绝对至关重要

translation.en: I have studied the Aztecs, Mongols and Zulus to arrive at my own theories.
translation.zh:
我研究了阿兹特克人、蒙古人和
祖鲁人 以得出我自己的理论

translation.en: -I should get my tape measure. -No, no, no, no!
translation.zh:
-我应该拿我的卷尺
-不不 不用！

translation.en: [stammering] I mean I have a royal tape measure waiting for us.
translation.zh: 我是说我有一个皇家卷尺在等着我们

translation.en: I am envisioning monochrome with geometric prints.
translation.zh: 我正在想象带有几何图案的单色

translation.en: -Sahil? -[knocking]
Hi, Eddie. [stammers] Andrew.
translation.zh: 嗨 埃迪 安德鲁

translation.en: -Amber. -[exhales] Is Sahil here?
translation.zh: 安布尔 萨赫勒在吗？

translation.en: -[stammering] No, I was just-- -Just...
[sighs] Helping with the search.
Sahil called the treaty tacky.
I went too far. Don't be mad at me.
translation.zh: 我有点过分了 别生我的气

translation.en: [laughs] Mad?
Look, I work with the guy daily.
translation.zh: 听着 我每天都和他一起工作

translation.en: I get it. He's opinionated.
translation.zh: 我明白 他固执己见

translation.en: It was a lead. We follow leads, remember?
translation.zh:
这是一个线索 我们跟着线索走
记得吗？

translation.en: I do, it's just we have a multi-million dollar business now
translation.zh:
是的 只是我们现在有
数百万美元的生意

translation.en: and Sahil would never risk it.
Multi-million dollars, really?
translation.zh: 几百万美元 真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah. So if you wanna write a story, write about us.
translation.zh: 所以如果你想写一个关于我们的故事

translation.en: -Like a puff piece? -Exactly.
-After the baby, of course. -Of course.
[exhales] Tell me you had success.
Thanks to your little ruse, the last hour's felt like a month.
translation.zh:
多亏你的小诡计
最后一个小时就像一个月

translation.en: -Once Sahil gets in the zone-- -He didn't take it.
translation.zh:
-一旦萨赫勒陷入他的世界...
-他没有拿走

translation.en: You're right,
I don't need to focus on this missing treaty.
translation.zh: 我不需要关注这个不见的条约

translation.en: [Richard] No, you absolutely don't.
Actually, you do.
Emily.
I'm not meant to tell you this because it's probably rubbish.
translation.zh:
我不想告诉你这些
因为这可能是垃圾

translation.en: But...
a curse will befall the King and Queen responsible for breaking the treaty.
translation.zh: 违反条约的国王和王后将受到诅咒

translation.en: Seriously? A curse?
Concocted by a sorceress to ensure the treaty wasn't broken.
translation.zh: 由女巫策划以确保条约不被违反

translation.en: Sorcery. Hardly a cause for concern.
translation.zh: 巫术 几乎没什么好担心的

translation.en: If the treaty isn't signed in time, by midnight Christmas Eve,
translation.zh:
如果条约不能在平安夜午夜前
及时签署

translation.en: it takes effect.
Why are you putting stock in this nonsense?
translation.zh: 你为什么要相信这些鬼话？

translation.en: It's a curse on your firstborn.
On this baby?
Our baby.
According to the history book.
The chance of this being real is infinitesimal.
translation.zh: 这是真的可能性是微乎其微的

translation.en: I don't care if it's one in a billion, I'm not risking it.
translation.zh:
我不在乎它是不是十亿分之一
我不冒这个险

translation.en: We need to find this treaty.
translation.zh: 我们需要找到这个条约

translation.en: [woman over PA] Attention, flight 1225 -[planes flying overhead] -to Aldovia is still canceled.
translation.zh:
注意 飞往奥尔德维亚的航班1225
仍被取消

translation.en: Eh, no clue when they'll start letting flights in,
translation.zh:
不知道他们什么时候开始
允许航班进入

translation.en: but I'll be on the first one as soon as they do.
translation.zh: 但他们一允许 我就第一个去

translation.en: How about you guys, how you doing?
Honestly, disaster on all fronts.
translation.zh: 老实说 各方面都是灾难

translation.en: Melissa is in love with Simon.
We have to cancel tomorrow's baby shower, the treaty is missing
translation.zh:
我们得取消明天的产前派对
条约不见了

translation.en: and if we don't find it by midnight on Christmas Eve,
translation.zh: 如果我们在平安夜午夜前找不到它

translation.en: our baby is cursed.
translation.zh: 我们的孩子就会被诅咒

translation.en: Hold on, you're gonna have to explain that one.
translation.zh: 等等 你得解释一下这个

translation.en: -It's a long story. -Emphasis on story,
and we have until Christmas Eve to sort it out.
translation.zh: 我们必须在圣诞夜前解决它

translation.en: -Tomorrow's only the 23rd. -[Rudy exhales steadily]
Well, I don't know much about this supernatural stuff,
translation.zh:
嗯 我对这种超自然的东西
了解不多

translation.en: but go easy on Melissa, huh?
translation.zh: 但是对梅丽莎宽容一点 嗯？

translation.en: Love makes people do funny things.
You gave up New York slices and bagels for meat jelly.
translation.zh: 你放弃了纽约切片和百吉饼去吃果冻

translation.en: Oh! Could you please bring me some bagels?
translation.zh: 你能给我拿些百吉饼吗？

translation.en: You got it.
Now, why'd you cancel your baby shower?
translation.zh: 你为什么取消你的产前派对？

translation.en: No one can get here. The storm.
translation.zh: 没有人能来这里 因为风暴的事

translation.en: There's plenty of people in the palace. Have it anyway.
translation.zh:
宫殿里有很多人
无论怎样 还是办下吧

translation.en: It just doesn't feel like the right time.
From what you're saying, sounds like a little hope and joy
translation.zh:
从你所说的听起来
有点希望 而且快乐

translation.en: is just what the palace needs.
Have the shower.
[Emily, echoing] A curse upon the firstborn,
upon the firstborn...
[hushed] Richard.
[Amber] The Royal Scandal of the Fathers of the Silk Road Treaty.
translation.zh: 丝绸之路条约之父的王室丑闻

translation.en: Royal scandal?
Did you know there was a love triangle
translation.zh: 你知道有一个三角恋吗

translation.en: between Prince Claude and Prince Jun over Claude's newlywed, Princess Jocelyn?
translation.zh:
克劳德王子、君王子之间与克劳德的
新婚妻子 乔斯琳公主

translation.en: I believe they taught us that at boarding school.
translation.zh: 我相信他们是在寄宿学校教我们的

translation.en: Oh my gosh!
Soon after the royal treaty was signed,
Prince Claude was poisoned. Many believed Prince Jun did it.
translation.zh:
克劳德王子中毒了
许多人认为是君王子干的

translation.en: The house of Devon, Claude's family, fell out of power
translation.zh: 克劳德家族德文郡的房子失去了权力

translation.en: and Claude's descendants swore vengeance.
translation.zh: 克劳德的后代发誓要复仇

translation.en: Devon.
Why does that name sound familiar?
translation.zh: 为什么这个名字听起来很熟悉？

translation.en: You're up early, my dear.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你起得真早

translation.en: Oh, I couldn't sleep.
Baby had a restless night.
translation.zh: 宝宝度过了一个不安的夜晚

translation.en: One day, you'll look back on all the sleepless nights
translation.zh: 有一天 你会回顾所有不眠之夜

translation.en: and you'll realize -they're amongst your sweetest memories. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.zh:
你会意识到它们是你最甜蜜的
回忆之一

translation.en: It's a big change, isn't it?
translation.zh:
是个很大的变化
不是吗

translation.en: It's the greatest adventure,
but your life will never be the same again.
translation.zh: 但是你的生活再也不会一样了

translation.en: There are so many things that I wish I could ask my mom.
translation.zh: 有很多事情我希望我能问我妈妈

translation.en: Amber, never forget that she's right here.
translation.zh: 安布尔 别忘了她就在这里

translation.en: Her spirit's in you and your baby.
translation.zh: 她的灵魂在你和你的孩子身上

translation.en: She gave you good instincts
and, through your baby, she'll guide you,
translation.zh: 通过你的孩子 她会指引你

translation.en: always.
I'm so grateful I have you.
I'm here.
For anything.
When you were expecting Emily, did you try hypnobirthing?
translation.zh:
当你等待艾米丽出生的时候
你试过催眠吗？

translation.en: Hypnobirthing?
What on earth is hypnobirthing?
[Dr. Magoro through laptop] Fear causes the body to tense up
and pain in childbirth becomes a self-fulfilling prophecy.
translation.zh: 分娩疼痛成为一个自我实现的预言

translation.en: So you're saying no pain is really an option?
translation.zh:
所以你是说
真的可以选择没有痛苦吗？

translation.en: Language is powerful
and we want to have a positive view of birth.
translation.zh: 我们希望对出生有一个积极的看法

translation.en: For instance, instead of contractions,
we'll call them surges.
-Surges? -[stammers] Like a surge of energy?
Exactly. Your body is powerful.
translation.zh: 没错 你的身体很强大

translation.en: And during labor, every surge you feel
translation.zh: 分娩时 你感觉到的每一次浪涌

translation.en: is a wave of relaxation,
pleasure and love.
Lucky you, men don't get those.
translation.zh: 你真幸运 男人不明白

translation.en: I want you both to lie back and close your eyes.
translation.zh: 我要你们两个都躺下闭上眼睛

translation.en: I'm going to lead you into a guided imagery meditation.
translation.zh: 我将带你进入一个有指导的想象冥想

translation.en: Imagine a surge,
relaxation, pleasure, love.
Feel its pulse.
We thought we'd be home by now, too.
translation.zh: 我们还以为现在已经到家了

translation.en: No, you may not peek at your presents.
translation.zh: 不 你不能偷看你的礼物

translation.en: [laughs] We'll be home as soon as we're able.
Love you!
Bye, now.
[sighs] This predicament must be resolved.
translation.zh: 这一困境必须得到解决

translation.en: If only the children were stuck here with us, wouldn't be so bad.
translation.zh:
要是孩子们和我们一起呆在这里
就不会那么糟糕了

translation.en: No place is more Christmassy.
translation.zh: 没有地方比这里更有圣诞气息了

translation.en: Leave it to you to find light in any situation.
translation.zh: 让你在任何情况下都能找到光明

translation.en: I assume that's why you keep me around.
translation.zh: 我想这就是你留我在身边的原因

translation.en: Still, I'd like to find a way home.
translation.zh: 尽管如此 我还是想找个方式回家

translation.en: If we don't stay to sign the truce treaty,
translation.zh: 如果我们不留下来签署停战条约

translation.en: our kingdoms technically return to a state of war.
translation.zh:
我们的王国严格上说就
回到了战争状态

translation.en: Of course, a war that would be fought by lawyers. [sighs]
translation.zh: 当然 这场战争将由律师来打

translation.en: Just a thought.
What if the Aldovians orchestrated this on purpose?
translation.zh: 如果奥尔德维亚人是故意策划的呢？

translation.en: They want the treaty signed just as much as we do.
translation.zh: 他们和我们一样希望签署条约

translation.en: Unless it's a way for them to force an unfair renegotiation of terms.
translation.zh:
除非这是他们强迫不公平重新谈判
条款的一种方式

translation.en: Renegotiation under duress?
No.
[Mr. Zabala] Good day, Your Majesties.
Forgive me, am I interrupting?
translation.zh: 原谅我 我打扰您了吗？

translation.en: Not at all.
May I present, with the compliments and best wishes
translation.zh:
请允许我代表奥尔德维亚的
安布尔女王

translation.en: of Queen Amber of Aldovia.
translation.zh: 向您致意并致以最良好的祝愿

translation.en: Thank you and good day.
Hm. An invitation to attend Queen Amber's royal baby shower.
translation.zh:
邀请您参加
安布尔女王的产前派对

translation.en: Today.
Amber!
-[Richard chuckles] -[playfully scoffs] Oh my goodness. It's amazing!
Seriously?
Your Majesty, our gift from S&A Events International.
translation.zh:
陛下 我们来自S&A国际事件
组织的礼物

translation.en: Sahil, you have really outdone yourself.
translation.zh: 萨赫勒 你真的做的很出色

translation.en: And you, Andy.
-[cheery instrumentals] -We're here to celebrate new life
-and strong bonds. -[exclaims of agreement]
Thank you.
Baby guessing game. I love it!
translation.zh: 这是图片婴儿猜谜游戏

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, please, our Queen.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 请 我们的女王

translation.en: -[group coos] -That's me.
-There I am, there. -[laughter]
[Mr. Zabala] And who is this little cutie?
Yeah, that's-- that's me.
translation.zh: 是的 那是 那是我

translation.en: [Mr. Zabala] Never would have guessed.
[gasps] Oh my goodness, look at this! -[group coos] -It's so cute!
translation.zh:
天哪 看看这个！
太可爱了！

translation.en: Thank you so much, guys.
-[cooing] -Will you look at this little bear.
-Oh, that is-- Look at the little ears. -[laughter]
So cute!
For you.
Did you make this?
Today.
Thank you so much.
That's so sweet.
Queen Amber, King Richard. My gift is a song.
translation.zh:
安布尔女王 理查德国王
我的礼物是一首歌

translation.en: ♪ Hark the herald angels sing ♪
♪ Glory to the new born king ♪
♪ Peace on earth and mercy mild ♪
translation.zh: ♪地球上的和平和温和的仁慈♪

translation.en: ♪ God and sinners reconcile ♪
Thank you.
King Tai played beautifully. [chuckles]
[chuckles, inhales] Everyone adores King Tai.
He is the only leader Penglia needs.
translation.zh: 他是彭利亚唯一需要的领导人

translation.en: But he's not the only leader Penglia has.
translation.zh: 但他不是彭利亚唯一的领导人

translation.en: [playfully scoffs] You and King Richard are truly a team.
translation.zh: 你和理查德国王真的是一个团队

translation.en: I do admire that.
I think you deserve more credit.
translation.zh: 我认为你应该得到更多的信任

translation.en: Credit is not something I seek.
translation.zh: 信用不是我寻求的东西

translation.en: Looks like our queens are getting along nicely.
translation.zh: 看来我们的女王相处得很好

translation.en: Happy wife, happy life.
translation.zh: 幸福的妻子 幸福的生活

translation.en: Speaking of which, mind if we slip out for a moment?
translation.zh:
说到这
我们可以溜出去一会儿吗？

translation.en: Sure.
Excuse me.
Please, could you tell me the status on the search of the treaty?
translation.zh:
请问 你能告诉我寻找条约的
情况吗？

translation.en: Well, we remain certain it's still in the palace.
translation.zh: 我们仍然确定它还在宫殿里

translation.en: King Richard has called for a specially trained police dog
translation.zh:
理查德国王叫了一只经过特殊
训练的警犬来

translation.en: to sniff out the artifact.
The dog arrives tomorrow morning.
Okay. Thank you.
I promised I'd build the crib on my own but I found the instructions impenetrable.
translation.zh:
我答应自己建造婴儿床
但我发现说明书难以理解

translation.en: I remember building our baby's crib. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我记得建造过我们的婴儿床

translation.en: Took me a month. [chuckles]
We each rule a kingdom. This can't be beyond us.
translation.zh:
我们分别统治各自王国
这不可能难倒我们

translation.en: -[book thuds closed] -We'll build like we lead, by instinct.
translation.zh: 凭直觉 我们会像领导一样建造

translation.en: [sighs] I never knew how complicated preparing for a baby would be.
translation.zh:
我从来不知道为孩子做准备
会有这么复杂

translation.en: Did it take you a long time to feel comfortable with fatherhood?
translation.zh:
你花了很长时间才对做父亲
感到自然舒适吗？

translation.en: Only until the birth, then it was automatic. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
直到孩子出生
然后一切就自然而然了

translation.en: I never experienced feeling that type of love before.
translation.zh: 我以前从未体验过那种爱

translation.en: When the most dire problem in the kingdom pales to a scuffed knee,
translation.zh:
当这个王国最可怕的问题
变成磨损的膝盖时

translation.en: you know you are a parent.
-[classical "We Three Kings" playing] -I read more of that history book today and you know what?
translation.zh:
我今天读了更多的历史书
你知道吗？

translation.en: This isn't the first time the treaty's disappeared.
translation.zh: 这不是条约第一次消失

translation.en: It's not?
Two hundred years ago, there was another incident, here in Aldovia.
translation.zh:
200年前
奥尔多维亚又发生了一起事件

translation.en: The thief made off with the treaty, but was caught red-handed.
translation.zh: 小偷偷走了条约 但被当场抓获

translation.en: Spent the rest of his years locked in a dungeon.
translation.zh: 在地牢里度过了他的岁月

translation.en: Princess Emily, please don't fret, I have never heard of such a legend.
translation.zh:
艾米丽公主 请不要担心
我从未听说过这样的传说

translation.en: And nor have I.
I have.
I started working for your grandparents when I was just a lad.
translation.zh:
我还是个孩子的时候就开始为
你的祖父母工作了

translation.en: They told me that the ghost of that wretched thief
translation.zh: 他们告诉我那个可怜的小偷的鬼魂

translation.en: still roamed the darkest depths of the dungeon,
translation.zh: 仍然漫游在地牢最黑暗的深处

translation.en: searching for his coveted prize.
translation.zh: 寻找他梦寐以求的奖品

translation.en: -I've never heard such nonsense. -Neither have I, Your Majesty.
translation.zh:
-我从未听过这样的鬼话
-我也没有 陛下

translation.en: -[Queen Helena laughs heartily] -I was of the same mind, Your Majesty.
translation.zh:
-我从未听过这样的鬼话
-我也没有 陛下 我也是这么想的 陛下

translation.en: Then, one Christmas Eve,
despite all the warnings,
I snuck into the dungeon.
And?
I heard a tortured moaning.
translation.zh: 我听到一声痛苦的呻吟

translation.en: Then I felt a chilling breeze...
and then...
I ran.
Okay, so this is my favorite.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是我最喜欢的

translation.en: -Aw! [chuckles] He's so cute! -I know.
Queen Helena said that it was Richard's favorite childhood toy.
translation.zh:
海伦娜女王说这是
理查德最喜欢的童年玩具

translation.en: Mr. Paddy Claw Paws.
Oh... I hope you have veto rights on your baby's name.
translation.zh: 我希望你对你孩子的名字有否决权

translation.en: -[Amber] Oh, okay, very good. -[curious instrumentals]
I can't believe you made this for me.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信你做了这个

translation.en: -I hope you like it. -I love it.
It's a special Penglian pattern my grandmother taught me.
translation.zh:
这是我祖母教给我的一种特殊的
彭利安图案

translation.en: [Amber] She must've been very talented.
-[Queen Ming] She was. -[Amber] Thank you. I appreciate it.
They're such fun.
I think we're almost done here.
translation.zh: 我想我们差不多结束了

translation.en: Looks like it.
I'm sorry for all the strife the treaty has caused.
translation.zh: 我为条约引起的所有冲突感到抱歉

translation.en: Well it's not your doing the treaty disappeared, right?
translation.zh:
条约消失不是你干的
对吧？

translation.en: Well, it's not that.
I know that Ming was uneasy about the idea of her and Amber signing it.
translation.zh:
我知道明对她和安布尔签字的想法
感到不安

translation.en: I'm happy for Ming to sign,
but she's worried what our people will think if she seeks credit,
translation.zh:
但她担心如果她寻求信任我们的人民
会怎么想

translation.en: despite all she does for Penglia.
translation.zh: 尽管她为彭利亚做了很多

translation.en: Aldovia has embraced Queen Amber.
translation.zh:
奥尔德维亚拥抱
安布尔女王

translation.en: Penglia adores Ming.
She deserves her due.
Not bad for a couple of kings on their own.
translation.zh: 这对几个国王来说还不错

translation.en: -Look at that. -Huh.
-Uh-oh... -What?
Pretty sure this is meant to be on the outside.
-Is it? -[exhales]
-Do you think it matters? -[bed creaks, crashes]
-[sighs deeply] -I think it might.
You really haven't missed a beat.
translation.zh: 你真的一点也没想念过

translation.en: [Lynn] You...
are not so bad yourself.
I think we deserve everything that's coming to us.
translation.zh: 我认为我们应该得到一切

translation.en: There's something I want to show you. Come with me.
translation.zh:
我想给你看样东西
跟我来

translation.en: -Simon! -Melissa, I--
I was... [stammers]
How about some tea?
What's that you're hiding?
Nothing.
What's really going on with you and Lynn?
translation.zh: 你和林恩之间到底怎么回事？

translation.en: What's going on?
I told you, she's just an old friend.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 她只是个老朋友

translation.en: Okay.
We dated, briefly, at school.
translation.zh: 我们在学校短暂约会过

translation.en: Two dates, three at the most.
translation.zh: 两次约会 最多三次

translation.en: We quickly realized we're better suited as friends.
translation.zh: 我们很快意识到我们更适合做朋友

translation.en: Now, about that tea.
Amber was right about you.
translation.zh: 安布尔对你的看法是对的

translation.en: An early Christmas gift.
You two can match.
Melissa.
It's Simon and Lynn together.
What's going on? What's wrong?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事 怎么了？

translation.en: You were right about Simon's intentions. He's hiding things.
translation.zh:
对于西蒙的意图你是对的
他在遮掩什么

translation.en: Look at this.
This is private financial information about the trade agreement.
translation.zh: 这是关于贸易协定的私人财务信息

translation.en: Is this an assessment of Aldovia's debt to Penglia,
translation.zh:
这是对奥尔德维亚欠彭利亚的
债务的评估吗

translation.en: a billion euros?
That sounds correct.
But a year ago it was five billion,
and with our economy, it should be gone by spring.
translation.zh:
随着我们经济发展
债务应该会在春天消失

translation.en: -[mellow instrumentals] -Unless the treaty is broken.
In which case it's due immediately.
translation.zh: 在那种情况下 它应该立即到期

translation.en: Simon's helping Lynn for a piece of the action.
translation.zh: 西蒙正在帮助林恩参与行动

translation.en: Selling out his own kingdom.
I say we make a formal accusation.
translation.zh: 我说我们应该提出正式指控

translation.en: I'll help you make it.
I'm so sorry, Melissa. I never wanted to be right about him.
translation.zh:
我很抱歉 梅丽莎
我从未想过对他的评价是对的

translation.en: I didn't want you to be, either.
We have a Malinois, a police dog arriving first thing.
translation.zh:
我们有一只马林诺伊斯
警犬首先会到达

translation.en: Once it sniffs out the treaty, we'll make a move.
translation.zh:
一旦它嗅到了条约
我们就会采取行动

translation.en: -Why wait? -We have to have proof.
translation.zh:
-为什么要等？
-我们必须有证据

translation.en: Can't offend the Penglians.
As long as this treaty is signed by midnight tomorrow.
translation.zh: 只要明天午夜前签署这项条约

translation.en: Meanwhile, I want you to keep an eye on Simon.
translation.zh: 与此同时 我希望你留意西蒙

translation.en: -I'd rather not look at him right now. -Please.
It's important he doesn't suspect a thing.
translation.zh: 重要的是他什么都不起怀疑

translation.en: Our baby's future depends on it.
translation.zh: 我们孩子的未来就取决于此了

translation.en: On the treaty? How?
Sit down.
Melissa.
You of all people know me better than that.
translation.zh: 你比所有人都更了解我

translation.en: No, it's too pathetic.
Melissa,
you just don't understand how things work in a palace.
translation.zh:
你只是不明白宫殿里的事情
是如何运作的

translation.en: No, too arrogant.
Melissa,
if you could only trust--
You came back?
-[dog pants] -I grew up with this breed, Your Majesties.
translation.zh: 陛下 我是和这个品种一起长大的

translation.en: Their sense of smell is unsurpassed.
The treaty will be sniffed out imminently.
translation.zh: 该条约将很快被嗅出来

translation.en: Can you please tell me the status on Aldovia's roadways?
translation.zh:
你能告诉我奥尔德维亚
公路的状况吗？

translation.en: Fully plowed by the end of day.
translation.zh: 到晚上应该就完全可以开路了

translation.en: And the airport?
Rescheduled to open this evening.
I've already spoken to our pilot. We depart at first clearing.
translation.zh:
我已经和飞行员谈过了
我们清早出发

translation.en: Have faith. The dog will find it.
translation.zh: 有信心 狗会找到它的

translation.en: Mr. Little has advised that we remain outside the palace
translation.zh: 利特尔先生建议我们留在宫外

translation.en: so the dog can work without distraction.
translation.zh: 这样狗就可以不分心地工作

translation.en: Where are we to go?
Aldovia's Christmas market is just a short walk down the hill.
translation.zh:
奥尔德维亚的圣诞市场就在
山下不远的地方

translation.en: It's absolutely magical on Christmas Eve.
Perfect place to hope for a Christmas miracle.
translation.zh: 期待圣诞奇迹的完美地方

translation.en: A Christmas Eve miracle. -We only have till midnight. -♪ ...goodwill to men ♪
translation.zh:
圣诞夜奇迹
我们的时间只有到午夜

translation.en: -♪ The world in solemn stillness lay... ♪ -Oh! It's Queen Amber!
translation.zh: 你太搞笑了  我看见汤姆邀请了自己 是安布尔女王！

translation.en: [gasps] It's Queen Amber!
-[gasps] Merry Christmas, Queen Amber! -Oh!
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐  安布尔女王！

translation.en: [man] So lovely to see you both.
[Richard] Thank you very much.
[Amber] Hi, Merry Christmas.
-Hello, merry Christmas. -You look amazing.
[Amber] Thank you so much.
-Hello. -[Richard] Hello.
Merry Christmas, Queen Amber.
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 安布尔女王

translation.en: -Merry Christmas, Queen Amber. -[choir continues]
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 安布尔女王

translation.en: Happy Christmas, King Richard.
translation.zh:
-圣诞快乐 理查德国王
-谢谢你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Are you enjoying the market?
[Amber] Loving the market. Thank you so much.
The people adore their Queen Amber.
translation.zh: 人们崇拜他们的 安布尔女王

translation.en: -[Richard and Amber chuckle] -I'd say they're both beloved.
translation.zh: 我说他们俩都被人民深爱着 一个美妙的圣诞市场

translation.en: You deserve the same.
You should accept the credit for all you do for Penglia.
translation.zh: 你应该接受你为彭利亚所做的一切

translation.en: -[Amber] Hi, everyone. [laughs] -[Richard laughs]
Queen Ming, King Tai, do come and join us.
translation.zh: 明女王 泰国王 一定要来加入我们

translation.en: -That looks fun. -♪ Making spirits bright ♪
-♪ A sleighing song tonight ♪ -Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
-I wish. - ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells ♪
-♪ O' what fun it is to ride ♪ -Say no more.
I can't believe they let us do this.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信他们让我们这么做

translation.en: Sometimes it's very useful to be king.
translation.zh: 有时候当国王非常有用

translation.en: Or a princess.
Faster, faster!
[laughs] You asked for it!
We will turn you into an extreme winter sports athlete yet.
translation.zh:
我们将把你变成一名极限冬季
运动的运动员

translation.en: -I'd like to try snow kiting. -Oh!
Perhaps next year.
You're my witness, Tom. You heard my brother.
translation.zh:
你是我证人 汤姆
你听到我哥说的了

translation.en: [laughs] I did.
This looks so fun.
I'll see you on the ice, all right?
Come on, keep up!
You're such a show-off.
-[Richard] Keep up. -And can't promise anything.
Don't fall behind. What?
Are you hurt?
-[ice whooshes] -He's a lot tougher than he looks.
[sighs] I'm really not, actually.
translation.zh: 实际上 我真的没有受伤

translation.en: I feel like a ballerina!
Look at them.
-That was amazing. -[man yells joyfully]
For a moment, I almost forgot about everything.
translation.zh:
有那么一会儿
我几乎忘记了一切

translation.en: -It's going to be fine. -[Amber sighs deeply]
With us and the baby.
translation.zh: 和我们还有孩子在一起

translation.en: I hope so.
King Tai.
Come on, Ming.
It's been too long not skating.
Anything else?
[gasps] Archery!
That's something I can do.
-I challenge anyone to archery. -[Queen Helena] You may regret it.
translation.zh: 我向所有人挑战射箭 你可能会后悔的

translation.en: We have a champion archer in the fold.
translation.zh: 我们有一个冠军弓箭手

translation.en: Champion archer? Me?
According to Queen Helena.
translation.zh: 根据海伦娜女王的说法

translation.en: I've seen her stop an embezzler with her bow.
translation.zh: 我见过她用弓阻止一个盗用公款的人

translation.en: Sounds like a bit of fun.
Visiting kingdom shoots first.
Richard...
Nicely done, my dear.
Excellent shot, my Queen.
Clear your mind and focus on what's most important.
translation.zh: 理清思绪 专注于最重要的事情

translation.en: You got this.
Excuse me, Your Majesties, a message from the palace regarding the treaty.
translation.zh:
打扰一下 陛下 有一条来自皇宫的
关于条约的消息

translation.en: The dog failed, the treaty remains lost.
translation.zh: 那只狗失败了 条约仍然没找到

translation.en: -Whoa. Bullseye! -[Amber sighs]
She's fainted.
Let's just make it to the chaise.
Really, Richard, [stammers] I'm okay.
translation.zh: 真的 理查德 我没事

translation.en: -I just want to make sure. -[Amber sighs]
Doctor Magoro. Sir, it's Dr. Magoro.
translation.zh: 马戈洛医生 先生 我是马戈洛医生

translation.en: Thank you.
-I understand the Queen's fainted? -Yes.
Yes, she fainted, but she's awake now.
translation.zh: 是 她晕倒了 但是她现在醒了

translation.en: -She has been overdoing it. -[Richard] I thought so.
translation.zh: 她做得太过火了  我也是这么想的

translation.en: You've overdone it.
She needs rest.
[Richard] Rest, yes. I'll tell her.
translation.zh: 休息 是的 我会告诉她的

translation.en: Why don't I drive to the palace?
translation.zh: 我为什么不开车去宫殿？

translation.en: We'd be very grateful.Thank you.
translation.zh:
我们会非常感激的
谢谢你

translation.en: She's on her way.
I told you, I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 我很好

translation.en: Still, you must rest until she gets here.
translation.zh: 不过 你必须休息到她来

translation.en: That's doctor's and king's orders.
translation.zh: 那是医生和国王的命令

translation.en: Princess' orders as well.
Rest.
How can I when we only have until midnight?
translation.zh:
我怎么能
我们的时间只有到午夜

translation.en: How long?
Great, thank you.
The airport is opening shortly.
Will you please arrange transport?
I will see to it, Miss Lynn.
translation.zh: 林恩小姐 我会负责的

translation.en: There you are.
Sorry, I have some news.
translation.zh: 对不起 我有一些消息

translation.en: The airport is open.
The Penglians are leaving.
[Queen Helena] Oh my goodness.
Shall I speak to them?
-Please, Mother. -Mr. Zabala
translation.zh:
-求你了 妈妈
--萨巴拉先生

translation.en: Yes, of course, Your Majesty. Excuse me.
translation.zh:
是的 当然 陛下
不好意思

translation.en: What do we do now?
We have to expose Simon and Lynn.
translation.zh: 我们必须揭露西蒙和林恩

translation.en: It's our last hope to find the treaty.
translation.zh: 这是我们找到条约的最后希望

translation.en: Absolutely.
Simon?
He and Lynn have been conspiring since she arrived.
translation.zh: 自从林恩到达后 他和她一直在密谋

translation.en: -That's disgraceful. -But not unexpected.
Listen, something is nagging at me.
translation.zh: 听着 有什么事困扰着我

translation.en: Call it instinct.
If we are correct, and Simon and Lynn took the treaty and hid it,
translation.zh:
如果我们是对的
西蒙和林恩把条约藏了起来

translation.en: why didn't the police dog find it?
translation.zh: 为什么警犬没有找到它？

translation.en: -We'll have to ask Simon. -But there's more.
The old scandal between Prince Claude and Prince Jun.
translation.zh: 克劳德王子和君王子之间的老丑闻

translation.en: The family swore they would get revenge.
Maybe that's why the treaty was nearly stolen 200 years ago.
translation.zh:
也许这就是条约在200年前
几乎被盗的原因

translation.en: The treaty was stolen before?
What, what's wrong?
I don't know, cramping. [pants] Cramping bad.
translation.zh:
我不知道 抽筋了
抽筋很厉害

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
Does that mean...
-I think so. -What is it?
I'm going into labor.
Hello? King Richard?
Doctor, Amber's gone into labor.
translation.zh: 医生 安布尔要生了了

translation.en: Labor? Now?
No, no, no, she's not due until January, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 不 她要到一月份才到期 陛下

translation.en: Her back hurts and she has cramping.
Could be forced labor due to over activity.
translation.zh: 可能是过度活动导致的生产

translation.en: She has been very active.
Tell the Queen, deep breaths and remain calm.
translation.zh: 告诉女王深呼吸 保持冷静

translation.en: All right. Thank you, Doctor.
translation.zh: 好吧 谢谢你 医生

translation.en: See you very soon. Bye.
-Is it true? Have you gone into labor? -It appears so.
translation.zh:
-是真的吗 你要生了吗？
-看来是这样

translation.en: -How far apart are the contractions? -Close. Getting stronger.
translation.zh:
-离宫缩有多久？
-关闭 变得更强烈

translation.en: We call them surges as per the doctor -who's on her way. -[phone ringing]
translation.zh: 我们根据正在路上的医生称之为浪涌

translation.en: This is her.
[Dr. Magoro] King Richard...
I found myself in a bit of a situation.
translation.zh: 我发现自己有点处境困难

translation.en: [exhales] Where are you?
North road. Stay in your car.
translation.zh: 北路 呆在你的车里

translation.en: What is it?
She's stuck in a snow bank.
But the baby's coming.
I used to volunteer at a maternity ward. I will help you through this.
translation.zh:
我曾经在产科病房做志愿者
我会帮你度过难关

translation.en: Tai, cancel our flight.
translation.zh: 泰 取消我们的航班

translation.en: Of course. Lynn!
Thank you, Queen Ming.
-I'll get Dr. Magoro. -[exhales] Richard!
I'll be back with her as soon as I can.
translation.zh: 我会尽快和她一起回来

translation.en: You can do this, birth plan or not.
translation.zh:
不管有无生育计划
你都能做到

translation.en: I love you.
-I love you. -[kissing sound]
-[Amber inhales] -Take care of her, please.
Richard, we heard about Amber. Is there--
translation.zh: 理查德 我们听说安布尔的事了

translation.en: -[gruff] I'll deal with you later. -[Simon] Wh--
-Good boy, let's go. -[thudding]
I too had the baby come early.
-You did? -My son.
He's okay?
He's intelligent, capable
-and has the energy of three boys. -[Amber sighs]
Your baby will be perfectly fine.
Your child is strong, Amber. Like you and Richard.
translation.zh:
你的孩子很强壮 安布尔
像你和理查德

translation.en: But I can't help but worry that it's going to be midnight soon.
translation.zh: 但是我不禁担心很快就要午夜了

translation.en: If that treaty isn't signed,
my baby is cursed.
Emily!
I told you not to worry Amber with that nonsense.
translation.zh:
我告诉过你不要用那些鬼话来让
安布尔担心

translation.en: But what if it's true?
Sorcery was discredited a long time ago,
translation.zh: 巫术很久以前就被怀疑了

translation.en: for good reason.
Many old treaties involved punitive superstitions.
translation.zh: 许多旧条约援引惩罚性迷信

translation.en: -It's not unusual. -[Amber sighs]
Tell me about this one.
Well, what I read was about a sorceress that cast a spell.
translation.zh: 我读到的是一个施了魔法的女巫

translation.en: Not tonight.
-Come on! -[horse brays]
The curse affects the firstborn child
of whichever kingdom causes the truce to break.
translation.zh: 无论哪个王国导致停战破裂

translation.en: Typical for its time, but that time is not our time.
translation.zh:
主要是那个时代
但那个时代不是我们的时代

translation.en: Still...
You don't want to risk it, I understand,
translation.zh: 我知道你不想冒这个险

translation.en: as small a chance as it may be.
A mother's love for her child is greater than anything.
translation.zh: 母亲对孩子的爱胜过一切

translation.en: Someone in this palace sabotaged the signing of the treaty. Why?
translation.zh:
这座宫殿里有人破坏了条约的签署
为什么？

translation.en: [exhales] Your Majesty! I've spoken to the doctor
translation.zh:
陛下！
我已经和医生谈过了

translation.en: and she said it's acceptable to administer pain medication for your...
translation.zh:
她说给你的病人服用止痛药
是可以接受的...

translation.en: surges.
Thank you, Mrs. Averill, but I need to keep my mind sharp.
translation.zh:
谢谢你 阿维尔夫人
但我需要保持头脑清醒

translation.en: Amber...
We all want what's best for your baby and for you.
translation.zh:
我们都想给你
对你和你的孩子最好的东西

translation.en: Please try not to worry needlessly.
Maybe it isn't needless.
It could be real. After all, our dungeon is haunted.
translation.zh:
可能是真的
毕竟 我们的地牢闹鬼

translation.en: -Haunted? -Yes.
Mr. Little even encountered it,
translation.zh: 利特尔先生甚至遇到了它

translation.en: the ghost of the thief who stole the treaty 200 years ago.
[breathless] Emily, listen to me.
I need you to do something for me right now. [sharp exhale]
translation.zh: 我需要你现在为我做点什么

translation.en: Why on earth did Amber want us to come down here?
translation.zh: 安布尔到底为什么要我们下来？

translation.en: She insists we search the furthest corner.
translation.zh: 她坚持我们寻找最远的角落

translation.en: [Emily] Pray we avoid the ghost that haunts this dungeon.
translation.zh: 祈祷我们避开这个地牢里的鬼魂

translation.en: You're not scared of the made-up ghost, are you?
translation.zh:
你不怕那个虚构的鬼魂
是吗？

translation.en: What was that?
Just-- Just our imaginations.
translation.zh: 只是 只是我们的想象

translation.en: Working in unison.
Come along.
[Emily] Leopold was here.
Now we are.
-[keys jingling] -[Emily] Oh, no!
[yelling] Help!
Oh, dear.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Help us!
Help!
Please help!
Dr. Magoro?
-Are you all right? -I am now, thank you.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-我现在好多了 谢谢

translation.en: I trust you know how to ride. [exhales]
translation.zh: 我相信你知道怎么骑马

translation.en: -I do, indeed. -[door clicks open]
-Poor thing. -[continued groaning]
This is not the time, Simon.
translation.zh: 西蒙 现在不是时候

translation.en: Amber.
You look like you could use these.
Squeeze these when you're feeling overwhelmed.
translation.zh:
当你感到不知所措的时候
挤压这些

translation.en: Works for me.
Thank you, Simon.
The hot water you requested, Your Majesty.
I need a heating pad and a paint roller with a good handle.
translation.zh:
我需要一个加热垫和一个
把手好的油漆滚刷

translation.en: Of course, straight away.
I have a heating pad and good luck with the roller.
translation.zh: 我有一个加热垫 祝你能找到滚刷

translation.en: Is there anything we can do to help?
I am charged with finding a paint roller in a palace.
translation.zh: 我负责在宫殿里找到一个油漆滚刷

translation.en: -I possess such an item. -[playful instrumentals]
-Really? -You do?
With a good handle?
A very excellent handle, yes.
And may I ask why?
No, you may not, Andrew.
translation.zh: 不 你不能 安德鲁

translation.en: Come, Mr. Z.
-We will get it. -Thank you.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Please help us!
Help!
It's no use, darling, no one can hear us.
translation.zh: 没用的 亲爱的 没人能听见我们

translation.en: Look, a key!
-[sighs] It's too far. -[strained exhale]
[breathless] That's really helping.
How long did you volunteer at the hospital?
translation.zh: 你在医院做了多久志愿者？

translation.en: -Many years. -You certainly learned a lot.
translation.zh:
-很多年了
-你的确学到了很多

translation.en: I learned no job is more demanding or rewarding than motherhood.
translation.zh:
我学到没有什么工作比做母亲
更有要求和回报了

translation.en: Penglia now has services in place
translation.zh: 彭利亚现在设有多个服务站点

translation.en: to assist and support all of our mothers in any way they might need.
translation.zh:
以任何他们需要的方式帮助和支持
我们所有的母亲

translation.en: [exhales] I heard about that program, it's fantastic.
translation.zh:
我听说了那个项目
太棒了

translation.en: I'm trying to implement something similar here,
translation.zh: 我试图在这里贯彻类似的东西

translation.en: with a few updates.
-You're so close. -[grunts]
That's it, almost. You have it, you've got it.
translation.zh: 差不多了 你碰到了 你碰到了

translation.en: -You got it! -[strains]
There you are. Good girl.
Almost there.
Lift it up.
-Emily! -[thud]
Emily, are you all right?
-Yes, I'm fine. -The stone didn't hurt you?
translation.zh:
-是的 我很好
-石头没有伤害你？

translation.en: Look, in there.
-I can't believe it. -The missing treaty.
What was that?
The ghost, coming to get the treaty.
-[pants] -No, listen.
It's the wind blowing through the stones.
-[stammers] So, no ghost? -[exhales]
No.
But we have the treaty.
But we're still locked in.
translation.zh: 但我们仍然被锁在里面

translation.en: -[Richard] Amber. -[Amber] Richard.
-[Richard pants] How are you? -No baby yet.
Everything's going to be fine, Your Majesty.
translation.zh: 陛下 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: How far apart are the surges?
Five minutes, progressing steadily.
Ah. Thank you for being so attentive.
It's useless.
It's nearly midnight.
It's over.
We mustn't give up.
But what can we do?
This.
[chuckles] Brilliant, Mother.
The linens, doctor.
[Amber] What time is it?
Ten minutes to midnight.
[breathless] Where are they?
The treaty, we found the treaty.
translation.zh: 条约 我们找到了条约

translation.en: What? Where?
In the dungeon.
How did you know?
Amber solved the mystery.
I did.
Come in, everyone. You all need to hear this.
translation.zh:
各位 请进
你们都需要听到这个

translation.en: Someone right here, in this very room, stole the treaty.
translation.zh: 就在这个房间里 有人偷了条约

translation.en: [Richard] Tell us everything you know.
translation.zh: 告诉我们你知道的一切

translation.en: The scandal that followed the signing of the treaty
resulted in the alleged poisoning of Prince Claude.
His family swore vengeance
and a member of that family is in this room.
translation.zh: 他的一个家庭成员就在这个房间里

translation.en: [Richard] Go on.
Prince Claude's family name, Devon, was familiar to me
translation.zh:
克劳德王子的姓
德文 我很熟悉

translation.en: and tonight I remembered why.
I read it in this book.
Your mother's maiden name was Devin.
translation.zh: 你母亲的娘家姓是德文

translation.en: Wasn't it, Mr. Little?
translation.zh: 不是吗 利特尔先生？

translation.en: I know it was you, Mr. Little.
translation.zh: 我知道是你 利特尔先生

translation.en: You were the last one to lock up the treaty,
translation.zh: 你是最后一个锁定条约的人

translation.en: you kept the dog out of the dungeon
and you tried to keep Emily out of the dungeon
translation.zh: 你试图不让艾米丽进地牢

translation.en: with some made-up ghost story.
translation.zh: 告诉她一些虚构的鬼故事

translation.en: -[continued sighing] -If you're guilty, Mr. Little,
translation.zh: 如果你有罪 利特尔先生

translation.en: confess here and now.
I did do it.
To break the truce
and sever our ties with Penglia.
translation.zh: 切断与彭利亚的一切联系

translation.en: But why?
I was bound by a solemn blood oath,
translation.zh: 我被庄严的血誓所束缚

translation.en: a sworn duty to avenge the crime against my family
by the Penglian Prince Jun.
Mr. Little, Prince Jun's guilt was never proven.
translation.zh:
利特尔先生
君王子的罪行从未得到证实

translation.en: Our historians believe that the real culprit
translation.zh:
我们的历史学家认为真正的
罪魁祸首

translation.en: was a covetous feudal lord.
translation.zh: 是一个贪婪的封建领主

translation.en: I had a duty. I fulfilled it.
translation.zh: 我有责任 我完成了

translation.en: You nearly started a war.
And could have cursed an innocent baby.
translation.zh: 可能会诅咒一个无辜的婴儿

translation.en: I didn't know about the curse until tonight.
translation.zh: 直到今晚我才知道诅咒

translation.en: And I would never bring harm to your baby.
translation.zh: 我永远不会伤害你的孩子

translation.en: -[Queen Helena] Mr. Zabala. -Ma'am?
Take Mr. Little to the Leopold Suite.
translation.zh: 带利特尔先生去利奥波德套房

translation.en: Simon,
I apologize for my behavior earlier.
translation.zh: 我为我之前的行为道歉

translation.en: Did you think...
We had our suspicions.
Not you, too!
Lynn and I have been working diligently
on economic amendments to the treaty which should benefit both kingdoms.
translation.zh:
修正条约的经济条款
让其对两国都有利

translation.en: And we've found a very promising solution.
translation.zh:
我们找到了一个非常有希望的
解决方案

translation.en: That's all it was, I promise.
What is it?
When I came to your room last night after Lynn left, you hid something.
translation.zh:
昨晚林恩走后我来到你房间时
你藏了些东西 没有

translation.en: [stammers] How can that relate to the treaty?
It didn't.
Lynn was helping to make sure I chose well
translation.zh: 林恩在帮助我确保我选好

translation.en: when picking out the most important gift I'll offer you.
I wanted to wait until tomorrow, but...
translation.zh: 我想等到明天 但是...

translation.en: Melissa, my love...
Although I'm undeserving of such an honor,
translation.zh: 虽然我不应该得到这样的荣誉

translation.en: will you marry me?
-[whimsical instrumentals] -Yes! Yes. -Yes! -[laughter]
[Richard] Congratulations.
Congratulations, Simon.
[Emily] Congratulations, Melissa.
You could have done worse.
Oh, that's a ringing endorsement. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哦 真是很明显的认可

translation.en: Don't let it get to your head.
I see a royal title in your future, Simon.
translation.zh: 西蒙 我想到了你未来的皇家头衔

translation.en: Perhaps Duke?
I accept.
This is such wonderful news. I'm so happy for you.
translation.zh:
这真是个好消息
我真为你高兴

translation.en: But we're running out of time. It's nearly midnight
translation.zh:
但是我们没时间了
快到午夜了

translation.en: and there's a treaty to sign.
-Quickly. -[Queen Ming] Yes.
We must allow the time for the Queens to sign as well.
translation.zh: 我们必须让女王也有时间签字

translation.en: There's always time to make history.
translation.zh: 总会有时间创造历史的

translation.en: [sharp exhale] But not too much time.
Your Majesty, King Tai.
The visiting monarch signs first.
After you, my Queen.
You have made me and all of Penglia very proud.
translation.zh: 你让我和整个彭利亚感到非常骄傲

translation.en: At the hour of 11:59, on December the 24th in the year 2019,
I declare the truce and treaty
translation.zh: 我宣布奥尔多维亚王国和

translation.en: between the kingdoms of Aldovia and Penglia
translation.zh:
彭利亚王国之间的
休战和条约

translation.en: executed,
ratified and renewed for the next 100 years.
We made it.
-[exhales] -Merry Christmas.
-Happy anniversary. -[cheery instrumentals]
Merry Christmas, everyone.
-Merry Christmas! -[excited chatter]
-Merry Christmas, Mrs. Averill. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 圣诞快乐 艾维尔夫人

translation.en: I think it's time.
-[Amber exhales] -Everyone except the father, out.
translation.zh: 除了准爸爸 所有人都出去

translation.en: The royal baby is ready to make its entrance.
translation.zh: 皇家宝宝准备好登场了

translation.en: Okay.
-Yes. -[Dr. Magoro] Thank you.
translation.zh:
-请把这搬走
-好的 谢谢你 好吧

translation.en: Okay.
[clicks tongue] Congratulations.
A healthy, beautiful baby.
[exhales] Thank goodness.
Well done, Amber.
Queen Amber, King Richard,
translation.zh: 安布尔女王 理查德国王

translation.en: may I present to you the future monarch of Aldovia,
translation.zh:
请允许我向您介绍奥尔德维亚
未来的君主

translation.en: your daughter.
[chuckles] Hi.
She's beautiful.
She's incredible.
Just like her mother.
Thank you.
Amber and I
are the proud parents...
of a new...
baby girl.
I knew it was a girl.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
Your father would be overjoyed if he were here.
translation.zh:
妈妈  如果你父亲在这里
他会非常高兴的

translation.en: Mr. Zabala, champagne for the baby girl!
translation.zh: 萨巴拉先生 拿香槟庆祝小女孩！

translation.en: Girl? Did I just hear I have a granddaughter?
translation.zh:
女孩 我刚刚是听到
我有孙女了吗？

translation.en: Merry Christmas, everyone.
I fought my way onto the first flight.
translation.zh: 我奋力上了第一趟航班

translation.en: You're just in time to meet her. Mother, Rudy.
translation.zh:
你正好赶上见她
妈妈 鲁迪

translation.en: Pop, you made it.
How's my little peanut?
Never better.
Meet your granddaughter, Elleri.
translation.zh:
认识一下你的孙女
埃勒里

translation.en: You named her after mom.
translation.zh: 你以妈妈的名字给她命名

translation.en: Elleri.
-You're perfect. -[laughs]
-Here. -Ooh!
Come to grandpa.
-[Amber] She likes you. -[Rudy laughs]
[Rudy] Yeah.
translation.zh:
对不起 我们需要称一下婴儿的体重
谢谢你

translation.en: Elleri.
Such a beautiful name.
Beautiful baby. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 漂亮的宝贝 恭喜你

translation.en: The plane is standing by.
We can be back in Penglia by sunrise to enjoy Christmas with your children.
translation.zh:
我们可以在日出前回到彭利亚和
你的孩子们一起享受圣诞节

translation.en: Go home, be with your family.
translation.zh: 回家 和你的家人们在一起

translation.en: And Ming...
thank you for everything.
Thank you.
Call me anytime.
Even better, bring your little one for a visit.
We can discuss our programs for mothers in person.
translation.zh: 我们可以亲自讨论我们的母亲项目

translation.en: I'd love to.
[King Tai] King Richard, it's been an adventure.
translation.zh: 理查德国王 这是一次冒险

translation.en: [Queen Ming] A Penglian symbol of mother's nurturing strength.
translation.zh: 母亲养育力量的彭利人象征

translation.en: It's yours now.
Are you sure?
Queen Amber of Aldovia,
translation.zh: 奥尔德维亚 安布尔女王

translation.en: you are going to be a wonderful mother.
Thank you.
Today, her Royal Highness, Queen Amber of Aldovia,
translation.zh:
今天 殿下
奥尔德维亚 安布尔女王

translation.en: safely delivered a daughter,
Princess Elleri Claire Charlton.
translation.zh: 埃勒里克莱尔查尔顿公主

translation.en: [woman 3] Come on, Princess!
[man 2] Congratulations.
I love our princess.
So do I.
I love you.
[Amber] I want to thank you all, my loyal readers,
translation.zh:
我想感谢你们所有人
我皇室的读者们

translation.en: for sharing this amazing journey with me.
translation.zh:
（安布尔博客：
你好 世界）

translation.en: I couldn't be more grateful.
On behalf of Richard, myself, Elleri and the Royal family of Aldovia,
translation.zh:
我代表理查德、我自己、埃勒里和
奥尔德维亚的王室

translation.en: we wish you all a very Merry Christmas
and a Happy New Year.
